posts.post_title: Super Nice N172 Old Judge Dan Brouthers FOR SALE

posts.post_content:
Net54 folks- Brian keeps offering wonderful museum pieces. I'm not his
 friend or business partner, it's just a pleasure to look at these beauties!

 Trent King

Thanks Trent!

Actually letting this one go for slightly less than I paid. 

You should see the ones I'm keeping ;)
